duties_responsibilities.duty: Effectively manage, recruit, coach, and motivate Team Members across multiple branch locations.
Lead the daily activities of staff and overall origination processes of mortgage loans within branches to achieve defined sales and quality service goals.
Ensure branches operate in full compliance with all federal, state, regulatory, and Company policies and procedures.
Lead Loan Officers in building mortgage loan volume and realtor relationships.
Communicate goals and policy changes to staff through regular meetings.
Maintain an active recruitment pipeline and regularly conduct interviews with prospective sales, support, and general branch staff.
Oversee area performance through hiring, training, advancement, and turnover of staff; complete performance evaluations as needed.
Manage Profit and Loss of branches in the area.
Be present on Company Branch Manager calls and retreats.
If a producing Area Manager, be in top 20% of Loan Officers in the area based on production.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Active NMLS license.
Three to five years of experience in mortgage loan origination activities.
Preferred three to five years of experience leading sales and operations teams.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite including Word, Excel, and Outlook applications.
Proficiency in DU/DO, LP, and major Originating systems.
Proficiency with all guidelines and websites necessary to complete job functions, including CFPB, FHA/VA, Rural Housing Development and Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac conventional programs.
